answers.answer: The objective of dopomoha.ro is to provide information and support for people from Ukraine who want to request help from Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '1. Objective of the Platform'.

answers.answer: The dopomoha.ro platform itself does not process personal data.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '2. Personal data'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania processes personal data only in the interest of website users who wish to request support services dedicated to refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '3. Purpose and grounds'.

answers.answer: Personal data provided is temporarily stored during the operation of the dopomoha.ro platform.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '4. Duration of data storage'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania can provide data to institutions or public authorities, as well as other competent state bodies, based on and within the limits of legal provisions, as a result of their express requests.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '5. Transfer of Personal Data to third parties'.

answers.answer: Users have rights including information regarding processing, access, intervention, rectification, deletion or portability of personal data, and the right to address the National Supervisory Authority or the judiciary. They also have the right to opposition, automated individual decision-making process, and to restrict processing.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '6. Your rights'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania processes data according to legal provisions, uses state-of-the-art technologies, and takes all reasonable technical measures for secure transmission and storage. All personal data is stored and processed on servers located in the European Union.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '7. Security and Privacy'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania will notify the National Supervisory Authority for the Processing of Personal Data within 72 hours if they discover an incident regarding the security of personal data that poses a risk to user rights and freedoms.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '7. Security and Privacy'.

answers.answer: No material on this site can be reproduced in part, in whole, or modified without the express consent of Code for Romania, who holds the copyright.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '8. Trademark and Copyright'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania reserves the right to revise and update the "General Terms and Conditions of Use" at any time, without notice or prior acceptance of the users.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '9. Changes to the General Site Terms and Conditions of Use'.

answers.answer: Code for Romania's goal is to mobilize young IT professionals to create digital tools that help solve social problems.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '10. About Code for Romania'.

answers.answer: Individuals can contact Code for Romania via email at contact@code4.ro or by mail at Pia»õa Alba Iulia no. 7, block I6, floor 1, apartment 6, Bucharest municipality, Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read the section under '11. Contact us'.
